channel.title: Looking for a coder
channel.description:
I'm looking for a coder for A server called rune perfection
Here is a list of what we need to get fixed Fix dupes Fix memory leak issues Fix deadlocks Make the game run smoother Make the client run smoother Add a client and cache version checker to the current client Change the client so it has the old style login box like Runescape Make the combat system near perfect Make switching better Fix some other in game bugs
If you can fix them or all comment here under. You will get developer rank
